lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Council President George Keller, who also is chairman and chief executive officer of Chevron Corp., told a news conference that the region had difficulties in persuading companies to locate there because of a fragmented local political system.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Among the corporate headquarters lost during the period were Crown Zellerbach, Memorex, Southern Pacific, Castle & Cooke and Rolm.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Corporate mergers and acquisitions in and around San Francisco over the past seven years have had only a modest effect on the metropolitan area's economy, a leading business-backed organization said.
